thread.title: Report: Devils' Elias to begin season on injured reserve
thread.title_full: Report: Devils' Elias to begin season on injured reserve

author: Deaths from gun violence vs. deaths from terrorism, in one chart
title: Report: Devils' Elias to begin season on injured reserve
text:
Report: Devils' Elias to begin season on injured reserve FOXSports 14 hrs ago Â© Getty Images NEWARK, NJ - JANUARY 06: Patrik Elias #26 of the New Jersey Devils celebrates his goal at 3:44 of the first period against the Buffalo Sabres at the Prudential Center on January 6, 2015 in Newark, New Jersey. (Photo by Bruce Bennett/Getty Images) New Jersey Devils veteran left wing Patrik Elias will begin the season on injured reserve, coach John Hynes told Rich Chere of NorthJersey.com .
It is not immediately known how long the 39-year-old Elias will be sidelined with the sore right knee that he has been nursing since the beginning of training camp.
AdChoices "Elias is still in the same situation right now. No progress. Indefinite right now," Hynes told the website.
Elias collected just 13 goals and 21 assists in 67 games last season. A second-round selection of the 1994 draft, Elias is the franchise's all-time leader in tallies (406), assists (611) and points (1,017).
(h/t New Jersey Devils )
